extension.name: PLG_RS_PAYMENT_PLATRON
extension.author: platron.ru
extension.description: This plugin enables standard Platron payments

field.name: lifetime
field.label: Transaction life time
field.description: To payment systems, which have no check. Set in minutes

field.name: pending_status
field.query: SELECT order_status_code AS st_value, order_status_name AS st_title FROM #__redshop_order_status
field.label: Order Status for ready to pay transactions
field.description: Select the order status to which the actual order is set, if the payment transaction could be paid.

field.name: verify_status
field.query: SELECT order_status_code AS st_value, order_status_name AS st_title FROM #__redshop_order_status
field.label: Order Status for successful transactions
field.description: Select the order status to which the actual order is set, if the payment transaction was successful.

field.name: invalid_status
field.query: SELECT order_status_code AS st_value, order_status_name AS st_title FROM #__redshop_order_status
field.label: Order Status for failed transactions
field.description: Select an order status for failed payment transactions.

field.name: sucess_url
field.label: Url customer to success
field.description: Customer with success payment will redirect here

field.name: failure_url
field.label: Url customer to failed
field.description: Customer with failed payment will redirect here
